text: "These Foolish Things (Remind Me of You)" is a 1936 jazz pop song written by Eric Mascwitz. It is one of the group of Mayfair songs like A Nightingale Sang in Berkeley Square. It was been covered numerous times by James Brown in 1963 and Bryan Ferry in 1973. ==References== Category:1936 songs Category:Jazz pop songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Billie Holiday songs Category:James Brown songs Category:Nat King Cole songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Bryan Ferry songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Etta James songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Aaron Neville songs Category:Sam Cooke songs
title: These Foolish Things (Remind Me of You)
